get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations of the Microsoft.Storsimple provider

200.description: The collection of available provider operations.

get.description: Retrieves all the managers in a subscription.
Retrieves all the managers in a resource group.
Returns the properties of the specified manager name.

200.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully updated

201.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully created

200.description: The StorSimple manager has been successfully deleted

204.description: The StorSimple manager is already in a deleted state

post.description: Complete minimal setup before using the device.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The minimal properties to configure a device.

202.description: Accepted the request to configure device.

get.description: Returns the list of devices for the specified manager.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device.

get.description: Returns the properties of the specified device.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Specify $expand=details to populate additional fields related to the device.

202.description: Accepted the request to delete the device.
Accepted the request to deactivate the device.

post.description: Returns the public encryption key of the device.

get.description: Returns the encryption settings of the manager.
Returns the extended information of the specified manager name.

put.description: Creates the extended info of the manager.

200.description: The extended information on the manager has been successfully created

delete.description: Deletes the extended info of the manager.

204.description: The extended information on the manager has been successfully deleted

patch.description: Updates the extended info of the manager.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Pass the ETag of ExtendedInfo fetched from GET call

200.description: The extended information on the manager has been successfully created

post.description: Returns the activation key of the manager.
Returns the symmetric encrypted private encryption key of the manager.
Returns the symmetric encrypted public encryption key of the manager.
Re-generates and returns the activation key of the manager.

AsymmetricEncryptedSecret.description: Represent the secrets intended for encryption with asymmetric key pair.

encryptionCertThumbprint.description: Thumbprint certificate that was used to encrypt "Value". If the value in unencrypted, it will be null.

AsymmetricEncryptedSecretList.description: Collection of asymmetric encrypted secret entities

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on a particular object. Name format: "{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{read|write|delete|action}". Eg. Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/volumeContainers/read, Microsoft.StorSimple/managers/devices/alerts/clearAlerts/action

display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation/action.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; governs the display of the operation in the RBAC UX and the audit logs UX. Default value is “user,system”

AvailableProviderOperationDisplay.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation/action. These value will be used by several clients for (a) custom role definitions for RBAC, (b) complex query filters for the event service and (c) audit history/records for management operations.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name – it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. It should use Title Casing and begin with “Microsoft” for 1st party services.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation – it should match the public documentation for the resource provider. It should use Title Casing – for examples, please refer to the “name” section.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be concise (to fit in drop downs) but clear (i.e. self-documenting). It should use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be thorough, yet concise – it will be used in tool tips and detailed views.

BaseModel.description: Represents the base class for all other ARM object models

id.description: The Path Id that uniquely identifies the object

type.description: The hierarchical type of the object

kind.description: The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported

timeZone.description: The device Time Zone. For eg: "Pacific Standard Time"

dnsSettings.description: Secondary DNS Settings of the device.

Device.description: Represents a StorSimple device along with its properties

properties.description: Collection of properties for the device

DeviceDetails.description: Additional details having endpoint count and volume container count

endpointCount.description: Total number of endpoints that are currently on the device ( i.e. number of volumes)

volumeContainerCount.description: Total number of volume containers on the device

DevicePatch.description: Represents the patch request for the device.

deviceDescription.description: Short description given for the device

DeviceProperties.description: Encases all the properties of the Device

friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the device.

activationTime.description: The UTC time at which the device was activated

culture.description: Language culture setting on the device. For eg: "en-US"

deviceSoftwareVersion.description: Version number of the software running on the device

friendlySoftwareName.description: Friendly name for the software version

availableLocalStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that is available locally on the device

availableTieredStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that is available on the device for tiered volumes

provisionedTieredStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that has been provisioned on the device for tiered volumes

provisionedLocalStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that has been provisioned on the device

usingStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes that is being currently used including both local and cloud

totalTieredStorageInBytes.description: Storage in bytes of the total tiered storage available on the device

networkInterfaceCardCount.description: The number of network interface cards

deviceLocation.description: The location of the Virtual appliance

details.description: Additional details having endpoint count and volume container count

encryptionStatus.description: The encryption status which indicates if encryption is enabled or not.

keyRolloverStatus.description: The key rollover status which indicates if key rollover is required or not. If secrets encryption has been upgraded, then it requires key rollover.

activationKey.description: The activation key for the device

properties.description: List of properties of the Manager

ManagerExtendedInfo.description: The extended info of the manager.

version.description: Represents the version of the ExtendedInfo object being persisted

integrityKey.description: Represents the CIK of the resource

encryptionKey.description: Represents the CEK of the resource

encryptionKeyThumbprint.description: Represents the Cert thumbprint that was used to encrypt the CEK

portalCertificateThumbprint.description: Represents the portal thumbprint which can be used optionally to encrypt the entire data before storing it.

algorithm.description: Represents the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the keys. None - if Key is saved in plain text format. AlgorithmName - if Key is encrypted

ManagerIntrinsicSettings.description: Intrinsic settings which refers to the type of the Storsimple manager

type.description: Refers to the type of the StorSimple Manager

ManagerList.description: List of storsimple Managers under a particular resourceGroup

cisIntrinsicSettings.description: Specifies if the Manager is Garda or Helsinki

provisioningState.description: Specifies the state of the resource as it is getting provisioned. Value of "Succeeded" means the Manager was successfully created

name.description: Refers to the sku name which should be "Standard"

location.description: The Geo location of the Manager

SymmetricEncryptedSecret.description: Represents secrets encrypted using Symmetric Encryption Key.

value.description: The value of the secret itself. If the secret is in plaintext or null then EncryptionAlgorithm will be none

valueCertificateThumbprint.description: Thumbprint cert that was used to encrypt "Value"
